OOC: Alloran, would it be okay if they helped Sharpedge back to their base?=


BIC: The Chosen Mafia and Shokaract get back to base. They helped Sharped=
ge and the other injured into the base. Shokaract was pleased with the batt=
le, Deemos was not. A smashed up Deemos waits for Plintissa. Testifier trie=
s sending a comm message to Technosis. She answered.

"Hello? This sounds f=
amiliar." SHe says.

"Because it's your brother! So, you are alive. They ar=
e after you and I was tricked into going with them!" Tesifier says.

"I und=
erstand." Technsois says.

"No! I'm not going to hurt you! I'm goign to kil=
l them, every one of them, right now!" Testifier said. He closed the connec=
tion before Technosis could complain, but she re-established it. He didn't =
hear any of her pleas and heads straight toward Deemos. Testifier places a =
blaster to the back of Deemos' head and fires. Sending him into stasis lock=
. Stronghold and Blender, who were injured, jumped up anyhow and both had r=
ifles to Tesifier's head. He tried to shoot them, but he faced a beating.

=
"So, what to do with this traitor, hmm?" Stronghold asked. Shokaract wlaks =
ovr.

"Kill him, anybody do it, but we don't need bots like him!" SHokaract=
 speaks loudly, and Technosis hears it. Psuedo listens in. Technsois cries =
out them to show mercy. Shokaract hears this some.

"This is ammusing, kill=
 him anyway, though!" Shokaract says...
